title: Sub Question 1
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Identification (1 point):

· Inventor of (all) art(s)/skill(s)

· leader / guide / god of travelers / leader of roads and journeys; Mercury leads/guides travelers, roads, journeys

· protector of commerce/merchants; Mercury has the greatest influence for (the acquisition of) money and for commerce

Latin words (1 point):

· inventorem artium

· viarum atque itinerum ducem

· ad quaestus pecuniae mercaturasque habere vim maximam OR ad quaestus pecuniae OR ad mercaturas
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

title: Sub Question 2
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

1 point: they say (that) / claim (that) / consider (that) / relate (that) / allege (that) / tell (that) / refer to / name / call / regard (OR other present tense translations of verbs of saying, thinking, and believing)

title: Sub Question 5
stimulusHtml:
